overview: Paris, winter 2004. A day begins. Confronted with the doubt of his own existence, a young man remembers the Stanzas of Dzyan. There exists somewhere in this wide world an old book, The Book of Dzyan (Dzyan from the Sanskrit word Dhy√¢na, mystic meditation, and first written in Senzar, Tibetan hieroglyphic language, -4000).
title: Les stances de Dzyan
